tooltip.evolutionboost.coin_bronze: Exclusive Cobbled Evolution Currency. Exchange it for special items at NPCs.
tooltip.evolutionboost.coin_silver: Exclusive Cobbled Evolution Currency. Exchange it for special items at NPCs.
tooltip.evolutionboost.coin_gold: Exclusive Cobbled Evolution Currency. Exchange it for special items at NPCs.
tooltip.evolutionboost.coin_platinum: Exclusive Cobbled Evolution Currency. Exchange it for special items at NPCs.
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_candy: Trick or treat! Maybe some Pokémon could use this in some way?
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_candy_b: Trick or treat! This item can be exchanged for goodies!
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_candy_p: Trick or treat! This item can be exchanged for goodies!
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_candy_r: Trick or treat! This item can be exchanged for goodies!
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_blood_v: A strange crimson vial. This clearly belongs to Lord Zeff.
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_bundle: A strange and eerie bundle. Dare to open it and see what's inside?
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_pumpkin: A strange cookie with a pumpkin embedded. Maybe some Pokémon could use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_skeleto: A strange cookie with a skeleton embedded. Maybe some Pokémon could use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_zombie_: A strange cookie with a zombie embedded. Maybe some Pokémon could use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween_ticket: A mysterious ticket emitting a gloomy darkness. Use it to get to Lord Zeff's domain.
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween25_bronz: A medal for the third place of the Halloween 2025 tournament.
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween25_silve: A medal for the second place of the Halloween 2025 tournament.
tooltip.evolutionboost.halloween25_gold: A medal for the first place of the Halloween 2025 tournament.
tooltip.evolutionboost.safari_ticket: Admits one to the Safari Zone. (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.shiny_charm: A charm that seems to be increasing the spawning rates of Shinies passively. (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.voucher_blank: A blank voucher that can be exchanged for specific vouchers. (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.voucher_iv: Use it to activate a global IV event! (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.voucher_xp: Use it to activate a global XP event! (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.voucher_shiny: Use it to activate a global Shiny event! (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.voucher_drop: Use it to activate a global Drop event! (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.voucher_ev: Use it to activate a global EV event! (placeholder)
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_ball_bl: A blue Christmas ball. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_ball_gr: A green Christmas ball. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_ball_re: A red Christmas ball. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_berry: Some Christmas berries that look delicious.
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_hat: This is the Christmas hat that the Grinch stole. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_sweater: A red Christmas sweater. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
A blue Christmas ball. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.christmas_twig: A Christmas twig used to build snowmen. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.cursed_coal: This cursed coal emits ominous and dark energy. It seems to have a weird influence on some Pokémon.
tooltip.evolutionboost.cursed_coal_heart: This was once the heart of the Ice Queen. The curse inflicted by Krampus seems to amplify hatred and grudge.
tooltip.evolutionboost.cursed_gift_black: A cursed gift colored in black.
tooltip.evolutionboost.cursed_gift_purpl: A cursed gift colored in purple.
tooltip.evolutionboost.holy_spark: A spark of hope for the Christmas spirit.
tooltip.evolutionboost.ice_crown: An icy crown belonging to the princess of Frostglow. It seems to be made for a very specific Pokémon.
tooltip.evolutionboost.ice_heart: Now that the curse is lifted, this heart might be capable of stopping the Ice Queen and her wrath!
tooltip.evolutionboost.ice_queen_raid_ke: A key that emits a freezing aura. Can be used to open the Ice Queen raid.
tooltip.evolutionboost.krampus_raid_key: A key that emits a sinister aura. Can be used to open the Ice Queen raid.
tooltip.evolutionboost.lost_toy: A toy that the Yeti lost. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.red_nose: The red nose of Rudolph. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
tooltip.evolutionboost.spirit_dew: This dew glows in polar lights. It has the potential of summoning a mighty hound.
tooltip.evolutionboost.spirit_dew_shards: Remnants of a legendary dew. It is said that once its true potential is unlocked, it can summon a mighty hound.
tooltip.evolutionboost.wind_up_key: A wind up key that is used for toys. Perhaps a special Pokémon can use it?
